title: 73 Best Amazon Gifts To Shop 2024—Including Lots of Prime Day Deals
description: You can go ahead and start wrapping now
author: Kristi Kellogg, Julia Harrison
byline: Kristi Kellogg, Julia Harrison, Gabrielle Pilotti Langdon
excerpt: We rounded up the best Amazon gifts that are sure to please. Thoughtful finds you can go ahead and start wrapping now—discover our top picks, on wellness essentials, housewares, and more!
text: Our Top Amazon Gifts PicksBest Amazon Wellness GiftsLulusilk Mulberry Silk Sleep MaskGood sleep is the real gift here—and this sleep mask will help them on their way to slumberland. Made of silk and available in six colors, this mask is hypoallergenic and the elastic strip won’t damage hair as they snooze.Natural Mulberry Silk PillowcaseThis silk pillowcase is the perfect companion to the sleep mask—a true match made in heaven. There’s a hidden zipper so the pillow won’t slip out mid-sleep. But the best part? There are 43 color options and four sizes, including a body pillow.Tatcha The Starter Ritual Gift SetThis top-of-the-line skin care set includes a cleansing oil, exfoliant, moisturizer, eye cream, and a hydrating essence. There are four different variations, so you can choose the one that fits your loved one’s needs (for example, if they have sensitive skin or dry skin). This is a thoughtful gift that’s perfect for Mother’s Day, a birthday, or the holidays.TheraGun Elite Handheld Electric Massage GunGive the gift of self-care with a handheld massage gun. This Bluetooth-enabled device from Theragun (the Rolls Royce of massage guns) comes with five attachments that can be used at five different speeds.Birthdate CandlesAnother one of the best Amazon gifts are these trendy candles are available for every day of the year (making them especially awesome birthday gifts). Each candle features a few fun facts about the respective zodiac sign, and the selected scents are aligned with that sign’s energy.Aesop Resurrection Aromatique Hand BalmThis luxe, concentrated cream will soothe and soften dry, chapped hands and smells of citrus and fairytale woods. And yes, you can buy lots of Aesop on Amazon!Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Pajama SetBecause who wouldn’t want a set of fresh, comfy PJs? This short set is made of lightweight, breathable knit jersey and comes in polka dot patterns and solids, and we’re all about that subtle ruffle detailing.YnM Velvet Knitted Weighted Blanket (10lbs)You can never go wrong gifting a weighted blanket, no matter the occasion. Heavier blankets offer a deep, gentle pressure that causes the body to release stress-relieving, feel-good chemicals in the body, making it easier for your giftee to relax, fall asleep, and stay asleep. Plus, it’s pretty!Hatch Restore 2 Bedside Light, Sound Machine & Sunrise Alarm ClockWe know what you’re thinking—an alarm clock? But it's not like other alarm clocks, it’s a cool alarm clock. This one works in tandem with your natural circadian rhythm to wake you gently with a glow and soft sounds at the exact right time in your sleep cycle. It also dims when you’re headed to bed, and comes with a variety of sleep sounds to lull you into dreamland.Best Amazon Home Decor GiftsRed Co. Enamelware Oval Serving TrayEnamelware blends right in with so many different tableware styles—it adds a fun rustic touch to an uber-modern dishware set and can also provide pops of color on a simple wooden table. Lasagna, charcuterie, salad, cake, vegetables… the options are endless.Vivivest Essential Oil Ceramic DiffuserThis oil diffuser is made of stone and is available in black or white. It’s also available in two sizes (one for smaller spaces and one for larger).Le Creuset Stoneware Mini Round CocotteThis is a perfect choice for a burgeoning chef, or any zillenial with a decorating habit. Also, it's small enough to fit in your tote bag on the way over to the birthday dinner party.Le Creuset Heart Salt & Pepper Shaker SetAnd if you’re wanting to go Le Creuset with maybe a bit more utility, these are an even better choice.Sabre Paris Tortoise Cutlery (Set of 5)The quickest way to elevate a dinner party, or, for that matter a steaming bowl of Top Ramen, is Sabre cutlery—and not just any Sabre cutlery, but tortoiseshell. Could it get any more luxe? Trust us, this will be one of their favorite things.Alessi Parrot Sommelier-Style CorkscrewWhile we’re talking things to elevate your dining experience, we cannot forget this parrot corkscrew, which will most certainly take the edge off a long day if the wine itself doesn’t. It is also part of the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days sale, so act fast.Click & Grow Indoor Herb Garden Kit with Grow LightThis is a great gift for anyone who has a green thumb, or anyone in New York who hasn't had access to a proper garden in a couple years. You can grow herbs, small vegetables, and fruit with this kit, including cilantro, thyme, lavender and even strawberries.Lodge 6-Quart Enameled Cast Iron Dutch OvenThis high-quality cast iron Dutch oven is available in more than 20 colors, including striking hues like orange, lavender, and this lovely cornflower blue. It’s one of Amazon’s number one bestsellers, and is top-rated with more than 37,000 five-star reviews.Acacia Wood Cutting BoardThis is likely to make its recipient feel like they are, in your eyes, a respected gourmand. It’s also a great selfish gift for those of us that like to head over to our friends’ houses for lavish charcuterie boards. This’ll give ‘em a nudge in the right direction.Mueller Fruit BowlThis is a true gem of a find. Since it’s oversized, it holds a bounty of produce, and we love its design-forward silhouette. It’s available in several shades, including black, gold, gray, green, sienna, and white (pictured).Bloomingville Ceramic MugsCoffee lovers will always appreciate a new set of mugs—especially when they’re this beautiful.Toyo Y-350 Steel Mountain Tool BoxThis is so ‘‘gift from dad,” but if you’re reading this, Dad—this is the right gift. It makes for a great unisex choice, and even if it doesn’t have the “wow” factor of a speaker system or a cashmere blanket, they’ll be grateful for it every time the IKEA package shows up without hardware.BUYDEEM K821 Electric Gooseneck KettleElectric kettles are a dream gift, especially this one, which comes in a sweet shade of mint green. In addition to choosing the exact temperature settings, it heats up within seconds. This electric kettle also holds the water at that temperature as long as you want, and when you’re ready to pour it you have a gooseneck spout for precision.Drinking Glasses with Glass Straw (Set of 4)Anyone will feel super chic sipping their cold brew or smoothies from these sleek eco-friendly glasses. The set includes four glass tumbler cups, as well as four glass straws. It even comes with two straw cleaners so that washing up will be a breeze.Jonathan Adler Women's Gilded Gala Round VaseThis fun vase from Jonathan Adler is made of high-fired porcelain covered in a white gloss finish. The vase is covered with adorable lips, with several sprinkled in gold. This would be perfect for displaying a dried flower arrangement or a bundle of stems.Bodum Pour Over Coffee MakerCalling all coffee enthusiasts! This glass pour-over carafe includes a permanent filter where you can toss in your ground coffee beans. It also has an adorable cork band that’ll keep you from burning your hands and it is on sale for Amazon Prime Day as we speak.roborock Q5 Robot VacuumBetween the suction power and accompanying app that maps out your entire home, this robot vacuum is truly the gift that keeps on giving. You can adjust the run time and choose which rooms it cleans first! The clean freaks in your life will be eternally grateful.Barefoot Dreams CozyChic Wild Baby BlanketThis celeb-loved throw blanket brand offers up the softest microfiber blankets. This baby-size version would be perfect for any new parents.NOVICA Multicolor Confetti Hand Blown Murano Style Art Glass VaseThis stunning vase is made of handblown glass and features stunning colors that will take their home decor to the next level. Since it’s handblown, every vase will be completely unique and stunning in its own way.Folkulture Cotton Kitchen Towels and Dishcloths SetThis set of flour sack kitchen towels will freshen up any kitchen. They are super absorbent and feature three different designs that correspond with each other.Alessi KettleThis stylish Alessi tea kettle will delight any design lover. Made of stainless steel, it features a wide base so that the water boils faster. You can choose between a blue or white handle, and there is a charming little bird sitting on top of the spout.John Boos Cutting BoardDouble-sided and handmade in Illinois since 1887, this sustainably sourced find can be used as a cutting or charcuterie board.Globe Electric Novogratz Globe Table LampLet there be light! Amazon is one of the best places to buy furniture and home decor, as evidenced by this industrial-chic table lamp.Cuisinart Fondue PotThis top-rated set is Amazon’s Choice for fondue pots. It's got a brushed stainless steel finish, and you can use it to heat up chocolate, cheese, broth, and more.Riedel Extreme Pinot Noir Wineglass (Set of 2)If you’re looking for housewarming gifts on Amazon, this set of wineglasses is a perfect way to say cheers.Cuzen Matcha Maker Starter KitThis is a higher price point, but if you want to go all out (or go all in on a group gift), this Matcha Maker is one of the most cool, unique gifts you can give. The award-winning design makes the highest quality, freshest organic drinks right in the comfort of your home.Technivorm Moccamaster 79112 KBT Coffee BrewerWith 40 grind settings, the Moccamaster is a master of functionality—it can grind beans for espresso machines, French presses, automatic brewers, and everything else.LĒVO II Essentials Herbal Oil and Butter Infusion MachineEven if your friend is into kitchen gadgetry, they'll delight over this infusion machine. You can use it to create fresh, homemade butters, oils, dressings, honey, beverages, and baked goods that are infused with the herbs and flavors of your choice.Ember Temperature Control Smart Mug 2This is another one of our favorite gadgets on Amazon: The temperature-controlled mug allows you to get your hot beverage to your ideal temperature and keep it there. Say buh-bye to lukewarm coffee.Boll & Branch Signature Hemmed Sheet SetWe're obsessed with this top-quality bedding, so much so that we featured them in our roundup of the best set of sheets on Amazon. This particular set is buttery, breathable, and makes you feel like you're sleeping in the fanciest hotel bed. The set also come tissue-wrapped in a gorgeous gift box which makes them particularly perfect to gift.LEVOIT Smart Home Air PurifierNothing says home sweet home like fresh, clean air. This top-rated air purifier has more than 11,000 five-star reviews and can effectively clean the air in larger rooms like primary bedrooms and living rooms. The air purifier is available in black or white.Acer 32" HD MonitorWe love a massive monitor, but if we're putting it in our home office, we want it to have a minimalist profile. This pick fits the bill. Consider gifting this to any bestie who works from home.Flexispot Electric Standing DeskThis Amazon find is another awesome home office upgrade. The standing desk is available in nine color options and several different sizes.Fun and FitnessOctobuddy Silicone Suction Phone CaseWhether they love scrolling Instagram for hours or filming their own attempts at TikTok dances, a little support in the form of a suction-y iPhone case will be happily received. The design itself is pretty fun, and the case will stick to mirrors, windows, and pretty much any other (clear) flat surface. It’s also a great gift for the solo traveler in your life because taking portraits when you don’t have any travel buddies can be tough (and this is a lot cooler than a selfie stick).Pott'd Home Air Dry Clay Pottery KitWe all have that super-creative friend, the one who feels no beginner's anxiety and dives right into a new hobby. This is the DIY gift for them. The kit includes air-dry clay, tools, paints, brushes, sealant, and a how-to guide to get you started.Stiroll Slim Leather BandFinding the right Apple Watch band is a tall task—and much tougher than it sounds. Whether they use it for workouts, everyday life, or both, different bands play different roles. But a sleek leather band is a wardrobe mainstay that they’ll appreciate when they need something subtle to complete an outfit.Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)Admittedly, these noise-cancelling earbuds are a splurge—but they’re so worth it if you want to really go for it.Bala Bangles Adjustable Ankle and Wrist WeightsAnother one of our favorite gift ideas on Amazon is this set of Bala bangles. You can use them as wrist or ankle weights during yoga, Pilates, or neighborhood stroll. Seen here in the color sea, they’re also available in blush, sand, sage, charcoal, and more.The Pickleball Club Exclusive Pickleball PaddleThis chic paddle is sure to delight the pickleball enthusiast in your life.LARQ Water Bottle PureVisStay hydrated in style with this sleek, self-cleaning water bottle. The award-winning design features a UV water purifier and is available in eucalyptus green, Monaco blue, Himalayan pink, granite white, seaside mint, and obsidian black.Monikers Party GameBust out this next-level take on charades and it will be the hit of game night—trust us. The box is the set of a card game (which makes it easy to throw in your bag) and it's the best party game.YETI Camino 35 Carryall TotePlanning beach trips and park picnics this summer? This insulated, oversized tote from YETI is just the thing for an outdoor adventure.Herschel Novel Duffel BagFor a longer jaunt, this duffel bag is a stylish essential with plenty of room for leggings, sneakers, a towel, and more. It’s also the perfect gift for any gym-going best friend.Kindle Paperwhite Signature Edition (32 GB)Everyone on your gifting list has probably lusted for a Kindle at some point. The lightweight reader is a dream gift for your favorite bookworm. It offers wireless charging, a 10-week battery life, and is available in denim, black, and agave green (pictured).Amazon Galison Quilts of Gee’s Bend Puzzle, 1000 PiecesA puzzle always makes for a good time, and we’re particularly fond of this one. It features quilts created by the women of Gee’s Bend.YETI Rambler 30 oz Travel MugWith double-walled insulation and an ultra-sturdy design, this viral travel mug is one of our perpetual favorites. It’s available in more then ten shades. We’re particularly fond of this crisp white and the seafoam hue.Stanley IceFlow Stainless Steel Tumbler with StrawAnd we can’t mention Yeti without throwing Stanley a bone also. We love the green of this stainless steel tumbler, and the handle makes it handy for long walks, picnics, and grabbing off the passenger seat floor to hydrate at stoplights.KODAK Printomatic Digital Instant Print CameraAn instant camera that suits absolutely anyone who likes to document the moment—so, these days, everyone. The Printomatic instantly prints 2x3 photos, giving you the instant gratification of seeing your photos. Especially great for weddings, parties, and trip to Paris.Everything ElseRavioli-Shaped Spoon RestOkay, this is a fun one. Whether they’re an avid home cook or a take-out enthusiast, this cute little silicone spoon pillow will put a smile on their face.Amazon Echo DotIf Amazon Alexa is the companion they need to get through their day—or they’re a diehard Amazon Prime fan (you can place orders through Alexa)—this inconspicuous little sphere will be a welcome gift. Lots of blue-tooth-enabled devices can be quite the eyesore, but this one is pretty inoffensive and packs a lot of audio power.YHNJI Croissant Night LightThis night light once went viral for having an actual croissant inside of it. We hope different for you (or do we?) but real pastry or not, it's an adorable decoration for those of us just a little afraid for out toes on the 3am walk to the bathroom.Papyrus Blank CardBecause a card is always a necessary part of the gift-giving equation. This pretty Papyrus pick is blank, so you have plenty of space to express yourself.Plush Velvet Travel Jewelry OrganizerIt’s no surprise that this cute little velvet jewelry box is a bestseller. It’s great for travel, and comes in nine pretty hues. (And since it’s petite, you can even use this as an elevated stocking stuffer if it’s that time of the year.)Apple AirTagWith an AirTag, they’ll never lose their keys again. Pair with a matching keychain holder and the gift is the complete package.Courant Catch:1 Wireless Charging PadCharging up your devices is easy with this aesthetic charger pad. It’s compatible with smartphones and AirPods.JBL Clip 3 Bluetooth SpeakerThis tiny speaker is a great gift for anyone who is always on-the-go. It’s perfect for travel, since you can just clip it onto your backpack and then you've got your hands free to ride.Bagail Packing Cube Organizers (Set of 8)Speaking of on-the-go, this set of packing cubes is another awesome gift for any avid traveler. They help you keep all your clothes sorted and neat, and they also manage to save a ton of space since everything is zipped up nice and tight.Orastone Rechargeable Hand WarmerThis rechargeable handwarmer is small, lightweight, and takes less than two minutes to heat up. Heat emanates from both sides and stays warm for three to four hours.Bombas Cushioned No Show Socks, 4-PackNo matter who you are, you’re always running low on socks. It’s one of life’s hard facts. Help someone in your life out with a 4-pack to replenish their supply, we promise they were running low.Godiva Chocolatier Assorted Chocolate Gift BoxAnyone with a sweet tooth will be thrilled to unwrap this decadent box of chocolates.Brightland The Duo Cold Pressed Extra Virgin Olive OilsThis duo features Brightland’s bestselling extra virgin olive oil and vinegar, both of which are sourced from family-run farms. The EVOO is cold-pressed within 90 minutes of harvest, ensuring the freshest, highest quality taste.Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Pajama SetWe could put this in wellness, fun, and everything else, because a pajama set is the most versatile, and dare we say necessary, gift of all time. You can never have too many, and this short sleeve set is darling.UGG Women's Tasman SlipperThis Ugg slipper is a staple: Easy to kick on and off, durable, and subtly chic, it’s a slam dunk gift for anyone. Seen here in driftwood, the shoe is available in a variety of neutrals and some bold colors, including a purple, red, and bright blue. (Shop the men’s version here.)Amazon Gift CardRounding out our gift guide is, of course, an Amazon gift card. True, a gift card can be seen as a last-minute gift, but does that make it any less great? They can use it for anything, whether it’s a new set of succulents or the air fryer or Bluetooth speaker they’ve had their eye on.
html:
Our Top Amazon Gifts Picks

Best Amazon Wellness Gifts

Lulusilk Mulberry Silk Sleep Mask

Good sleep is the real gift here—and this sleep mask will help them on their way to slumberland. Made of silk and available in six colors, this mask is hypoallergenic and the elastic strip won’t damage hair as they snooze.

Natural Mulberry Silk Pillowcase

This silk pillowcase is the perfect companion to the sleep mask—a true match made in heaven. There’s a hidden zipper so the pillow won’t slip out mid-sleep. But the best part? There are 43 color options and four sizes, including a body pillow.

Tatcha The Starter Ritual Gift Set

This top-of-the-line skin care set includes a cleansing oil, exfoliant, moisturizer, eye cream, and a hydrating essence. There are four different variations, so you can choose the one that fits your loved one’s needs (for example, if they have sensitive skin or dry skin). This is a thoughtful gift that’s perfect for Mother’s Day, a birthday, or the holidays.

TheraGun Elite Handheld Electric Massage Gun

Give the gift of self-care with a handheld massage gun. This Bluetooth-enabled device from Theragun (the Rolls Royce of massage guns) comes with five attachments that can be used at five different speeds.

Birthdate Candles

Another one of the best Amazon gifts are these trendy candles are available for every day of the year (making them especially awesome birthday gifts). Each candle features a few fun facts about the respective zodiac sign, and the selected scents are aligned with that sign’s energy.

Aesop Resurrection Aromatique Hand Balm

This luxe, concentrated cream will soothe and soften dry, chapped hands and smells of citrus and fairytale woods. And yes, you can buy lots of Aesop on Amazon!

Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Pajama Set

Because who wouldn’t want a set of fresh, comfy PJs? This short set is made of lightweight, breathable knit jersey and comes in polka dot patterns and solids, and we’re all about that subtle ruffle detailing.

YnM Velvet Knitted Weighted Blanket (10lbs)

You can never go wrong gifting a weighted blanket, no matter the occasion. Heavier blankets offer a deep, gentle pressure that causes the body to release stress-relieving, feel-good chemicals in the body, making it easier for your giftee to relax, fall asleep, and stay asleep. Plus, it’s pretty!

Hatch Restore 2 Bedside Light, Sound Machine & Sunrise Alarm Clock

We know what you’re thinking—an alarm clock? But it's not like other alarm clocks, it’s a cool alarm clock. This one works in tandem with your natural circadian rhythm to wake you gently with a glow and soft sounds at the exact right time in your sleep cycle. It also dims when you’re headed to bed, and comes with a variety of sleep sounds to lull you into dreamland.

Best Amazon Home Decor Gifts

Red Co. Enamelware Oval Serving Tray

Enamelware blends right in with so many different tableware styles—it adds a fun rustic touch to an uber-modern dishware set and can also provide pops of color on a simple wooden table. Lasagna, charcuterie, salad, cake, vegetables… the options are endless.

Vivivest Essential Oil Ceramic Diffuser

This oil diffuser is made of stone and is available in black or white. It’s also available in two sizes (one for smaller spaces and one for larger).

Le Creuset Stoneware Mini Round Cocotte

This is a perfect choice for a burgeoning chef, or any zillenial with a decorating habit. Also, it's small enough to fit in your tote bag on the way over to the birthday dinner party.

Le Creuset Heart Salt & Pepper Shaker Set

And if you’re wanting to go Le Creuset with maybe a bit more utility, these are an even better choice.

Sabre Paris Tortoise Cutlery (Set of 5)

The quickest way to elevate a dinner party, or, for that matter a steaming bowl of Top Ramen, is Sabre cutlery—and not just any Sabre cutlery, but tortoiseshell. Could it get any more luxe? Trust us, this will be one of their favorite things.

Alessi Parrot Sommelier-Style Corkscrew

While we’re talking things to elevate your dining experience, we cannot forget this parrot corkscrew, which will most certainly take the edge off a long day if the wine itself doesn’t. It is also part of the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days sale, so act fast.

Click & Grow Indoor Herb Garden Kit with Grow Light

This is a great gift for anyone who has a green thumb, or anyone in New York who hasn't had access to a proper garden in a couple years. You can grow herbs, small vegetables, and fruit with this kit, including cilantro, thyme, lavender and even strawberries.

Lodge 6-Quart Enameled Cast Iron Dutch Oven

This high-quality cast iron Dutch oven is available in more than 20 colors, including striking hues like orange, lavender, and this lovely cornflower blue. It’s one of Amazon’s number one bestsellers, and is top-rated with more than 37,000 five-star reviews.

Acacia Wood Cutting Board

This is likely to make its recipient feel like they are, in your eyes, a respected gourmand. It’s also a great selfish gift for those of us that like to head over to our friends’ houses for lavish charcuterie boards. This’ll give ‘em a nudge in the right direction.

Mueller Fruit Bowl

This is a true gem of a find. Since it’s oversized, it holds a bounty of produce, and we love its design-forward silhouette. It’s available in several shades, including black, gold, gray, green, sienna, and white (pictured).

Bloomingville Ceramic Mugs

Coffee lovers will always appreciate a new set of mugs—especially when they’re this beautiful.

Toyo Y-350 Steel Mountain Tool Box

This is so ‘‘gift from dad,” but if you’re reading this, Dad—this is the right gift. It makes for a great unisex choice, and even if it doesn’t have the “wow” factor of a speaker system or a cashmere blanket, they’ll be grateful for it every time the IKEA package shows up without hardware.

BUYDEEM K821 Electric Gooseneck Kettle

Electric kettles are a dream gift, especially this one, which comes in a sweet shade of mint green. In addition to choosing the exact temperature settings, it heats up within seconds. This electric kettle also holds the water at that temperature as long as you want, and when you’re ready to pour it you have a gooseneck spout for precision.

Drinking Glasses with Glass Straw (Set of 4)

Anyone will feel super chic sipping their cold brew or smoothies from these sleek eco-friendly glasses. The set includes four glass tumbler cups, as well as four glass straws. It even comes with two straw cleaners so that washing up will be a breeze.

Jonathan Adler Women's Gilded Gala Round Vase

This fun vase from Jonathan Adler is made of high-fired porcelain covered in a white gloss finish. The vase is covered with adorable lips, with several sprinkled in gold. This would be perfect for displaying a dried flower arrangement or a bundle of stems.

Bodum Pour Over Coffee Maker

Calling all coffee enthusiasts! This glass pour-over carafe includes a permanent filter where you can toss in your ground coffee beans. It also has an adorable cork band that’ll keep you from burning your hands and it is on sale for Amazon Prime Day as we speak.

roborock Q5 Robot Vacuum

Between the suction power and accompanying app that maps out your entire home, this robot vacuum is truly the gift that keeps on giving. You can adjust the run time and choose which rooms it cleans first! The clean freaks in your life will be eternally grateful.

Barefoot Dreams CozyChic Wild Baby Blanket

This celeb-loved throw blanket brand offers up the softest microfiber blankets. This baby-size version would be perfect for any new parents.

NOVICA Multicolor Confetti Hand Blown Murano Style Art Glass Vase

This stunning vase is made of handblown glass and features stunning colors that will take their home decor to the next level. Since it’s handblown, every vase will be completely unique and stunning in its own way.

Folkulture Cotton Kitchen Towels and Dishcloths Set

This set of flour sack kitchen towels will freshen up any kitchen. They are super absorbent and feature three different designs that correspond with each other.

Alessi Kettle

This stylish Alessi tea kettle will delight any design lover. Made of stainless steel, it features a wide base so that the water boils faster. You can choose between a blue or white handle, and there is a charming little bird sitting on top of the spout.

John Boos Cutting Board

Double-sided and handmade in Illinois since 1887, this sustainably sourced find can be used as a cutting or charcuterie board.

Globe Electric Novogratz Globe Table Lamp

Let there be light! Amazon is one of the best places to buy furniture and home decor, as evidenced by this industrial-chic table lamp.

Cuisinart Fondue Pot

This top-rated set is Amazon’s Choice for fondue pots. It's got a brushed stainless steel finish, and you can use it to heat up chocolate, cheese, broth, and more.

Riedel Extreme Pinot Noir Wineglass (Set of 2)

If you’re looking for housewarming gifts on Amazon, this set of wineglasses is a perfect way to say cheers.

Cuzen Matcha Maker Starter Kit

This is a higher price point, but if you want to go all out (or go all in on a group gift), this Matcha Maker is one of the most cool, unique gifts you can give. The award-winning design makes the highest quality, freshest organic drinks right in the comfort of your home.

Technivorm Moccamaster 79112 KBT Coffee Brewer

With 40 grind settings, the Moccamaster is a master of functionality—it can grind beans for espresso machines, French presses, automatic brewers, and everything else.

LĒVO II Essentials Herbal Oil and Butter Infusion Machine

Even if your friend is into kitchen gadgetry, they'll delight over this infusion machine. You can use it to create fresh, homemade butters, oils, dressings, honey, beverages, and baked goods that are infused with the herbs and flavors of your choice.

Ember Temperature Control Smart Mug 2

This is another one of our favorite gadgets on Amazon: The temperature-controlled mug allows you to get your hot beverage to your ideal temperature and keep it there. Say buh-bye to lukewarm coffee.

Boll & Branch Signature Hemmed Sheet Set

We're obsessed with this top-quality bedding, so much so that we featured them in our roundup of the best set of sheets on Amazon. This particular set is buttery, breathable, and makes you feel like you're sleeping in the fanciest hotel bed. The set also come tissue-wrapped in a gorgeous gift box which makes them particularly perfect to gift.

LEVOIT Smart Home Air Purifier

Nothing says home sweet home like fresh, clean air. This top-rated air purifier has more than 11,000 five-star reviews and can effectively clean the air in larger rooms like primary bedrooms and living rooms. The air purifier is available in black or white.

Acer 32" HD Monitor

We love a massive monitor, but if we're putting it in our home office, we want it to have a minimalist profile. This pick fits the bill. Consider gifting this to any bestie who works from home.

Flexispot Electric Standing Desk

This Amazon find is another awesome home office upgrade. The standing desk is available in nine color options and several different sizes.

Fun and Fitness

Octobuddy Silicone Suction Phone Case

Whether they love scrolling Instagram for hours or filming their own attempts at TikTok dances, a little support in the form of a suction-y iPhone case will be happily received. The design itself is pretty fun, and the case will stick to mirrors, windows, and pretty much any other (clear) flat surface. It’s also a great gift for the solo traveler in your life because taking portraits when you don’t have any travel buddies can be tough (and this is a lot cooler than a selfie stick).

Pott'd Home Air Dry Clay Pottery Kit

We all have that super-creative friend, the one who feels no beginner's anxiety and dives right into a new hobby. This is the DIY gift for them. The kit includes air-dry clay, tools, paints, brushes, sealant, and a how-to guide to get you started.

Stiroll Slim Leather Band

Finding the right Apple Watch band is a tall task—and much tougher than it sounds. Whether they use it for workouts, everyday life, or both, different bands play different roles. But a sleek leather band is a wardrobe mainstay that they’ll appreciate when they need something subtle to complete an outfit.

Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)

Admittedly, these noise-cancelling earbuds are a splurge—but they’re so worth it if you want to really go for it.

Bala Bangles Adjustable Ankle and Wrist Weights

Another one of our favorite gift ideas on Amazon is this set of Bala bangles. You can use them as wrist or ankle weights during yoga, Pilates, or neighborhood stroll. Seen here in the color sea, they’re also available in blush, sand, sage, charcoal, and more.

The Pickleball Club Exclusive Pickleball Paddle

This chic paddle is sure to delight the pickleball enthusiast in your life.

LARQ Water Bottle PureVis

Stay hydrated in style with this sleek, self-cleaning water bottle. The award-winning design features a UV water purifier and is available in eucalyptus green, Monaco blue, Himalayan pink, granite white, seaside mint, and obsidian black.

Monikers Party Game

Bust out this next-level take on charades and it will be the hit of game night—trust us. The box is the set of a card game (which makes it easy to throw in your bag) and it's the best party game.

YETI Camino 35 Carryall Tote

Planning beach trips and park picnics this summer? This insulated, oversized tote from YETI is just the thing for an outdoor adventure.

Herschel Novel Duffel Bag

For a longer jaunt, this duffel bag is a stylish essential with plenty of room for leggings, sneakers, a towel, and more. It’s also the perfect gift for any gym-going best friend.

Kindle Paperwhite Signature Edition (32 GB)

Everyone on your gifting list has probably lusted for a Kindle at some point. The lightweight reader is a dream gift for your favorite bookworm. It offers wireless charging, a 10-week battery life, and is available in denim, black, and agave green (pictured).

Amazon Galison Quilts of Gee’s Bend Puzzle, 1000 Pieces

A puzzle always makes for a good time, and we’re particularly fond of this one. It features quilts created by the women of Gee’s Bend.

YETI Rambler 30 oz Travel Mug

With double-walled insulation and an ultra-sturdy design, this viral travel mug is one of our perpetual favorites. It’s available in more then ten shades. We’re particularly fond of this crisp white and the seafoam hue.

Stanley IceFlow Stainless Steel Tumbler with Straw

And we can’t mention Yeti without throwing Stanley a bone also. We love the green of this stainless steel tumbler, and the handle makes it handy for long walks, picnics, and grabbing off the passenger seat floor to hydrate at stoplights.

KODAK Printomatic Digital Instant Print Camera

An instant camera that suits absolutely anyone who likes to document the moment—so, these days, everyone. The Printomatic instantly prints 2x3 photos, giving you the instant gratification of seeing your photos. Especially great for weddings, parties, and trip to Paris.

Everything Else

Ravioli-Shaped Spoon Rest

Okay, this is a fun one. Whether they’re an avid home cook or a take-out enthusiast, this cute little silicone spoon pillow will put a smile on their face.

Amazon Echo Dot

If Amazon Alexa is the companion they need to get through their day—or they’re a diehard Amazon Prime fan (you can place orders through Alexa)—this inconspicuous little sphere will be a welcome gift. Lots of blue-tooth-enabled devices can be quite the eyesore, but this one is pretty inoffensive and packs a lot of audio power.

YHNJI Croissant Night Light

This night light once went viral for having an actual croissant inside of it. We hope different for you (or do we?) but real pastry or not, it's an adorable decoration for those of us just a little afraid for out toes on the 3am walk to the bathroom.

Papyrus Blank Card

Because a card is always a necessary part of the gift-giving equation. This pretty Papyrus pick is blank, so you have plenty of space to express yourself.

Plush Velvet Travel Jewelry Organizer

It’s no surprise that this cute little velvet jewelry box is a bestseller. It’s great for travel, and comes in nine pretty hues. (And since it’s petite, you can even use this as an elevated stocking stuffer if it’s that time of the year.)

Apple AirTag

With an AirTag, they’ll never lose their keys again. Pair with a matching keychain holder and the gift is the complete package.

Courant Catch:1 Wireless Charging Pad

Charging up your devices is easy with this aesthetic charger pad. It’s compatible with smartphones and AirPods.

JBL Clip 3 Bluetooth Speaker

This tiny speaker is a great gift for anyone who is always on-the-go. It’s perfect for travel, since you can just clip it onto your backpack and then you've got your hands free to ride.

Bagail Packing Cube Organizers (Set of 8)

Speaking of on-the-go, this set of packing cubes is another awesome gift for any avid traveler. They help you keep all your clothes sorted and neat, and they also manage to save a ton of space since everything is zipped up nice and tight.

Orastone Rechargeable Hand Warmer

This rechargeable handwarmer is small, lightweight, and takes less than two minutes to heat up. Heat emanates from both sides and stays warm for three to four hours.

Bombas Cushioned No Show Socks, 4-Pack

No matter who you are, you’re always running low on socks. It’s one of life’s hard facts. Help someone in your life out with a 4-pack to replenish their supply, we promise they were running low.

Godiva Chocolatier Assorted Chocolate Gift Box

Anyone with a sweet tooth will be thrilled to unwrap this decadent box of chocolates.

Brightland The Duo Cold Pressed Extra Virgin Olive Oils

This duo features Brightland’s bestselling extra virgin olive oil and vinegar, both of which are sourced from family-run farms. The EVOO is cold-pressed within 90 minutes of harvest, ensuring the freshest, highest quality taste.

Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Pajama Set

We could put this in wellness, fun, and everything else, because a pajama set is the most versatile, and dare we say necessary, gift of all time. You can never have too many, and this short sleeve set is darling.

UGG Women's Tasman Slipper

This Ugg slipper is a staple: Easy to kick on and off, durable, and subtly chic, it’s a slam dunk gift for anyone. Seen here in driftwood, the shoe is available in a variety of neutrals and some bold colors, including a purple, red, and bright blue. (Shop the men’s version here.)

Amazon Gift Card

Rounding out our gift guide is, of course, an Amazon gift card. True, a gift card can be seen as a last-minute gift, but does that make it any less great? They can use it for anything, whether it’s a new set of succulents or the air fryer or Bluetooth speaker they’ve had their eye on.
